Package ex3.render.raytrace

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IInitable
    Interface for objects that can initialize from attribute pairs
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Camera class represents the camera view in the scene
    DirectionLight
    Direction Light extends Light, used to calculate directional light in scene
    Disc
    Extends Sphere.
    Intersection
    Intersection class used to calculate light and surface intersections
    Light
    Abstract class, Implements IInitable,Used to represent light in scene
    OmniLight
    OmniLight extends Light, represents Omnilight in scene
    Point3D
    Represents a point in 3D space
    Polygon
    Polygon extends Surface, represents general polygon in space
    Ray
    Represents a Ray with point (Point3D) and direction (Vec)
    RayTracer
    Main class, implements IRenderer
    Scene
    A Scene class containing all the scene objects including camera, lights and surfaces.
    Sphere
    Implements Surface, representing a sphere
    SpotLight
    Spotlight extends Light, represents a spotlight
    Surface
    Abstract class.
    Vec
    Regular vector 3D class
